descriptionHtml:
COMPATIBLE WITH \"SKYRIM FLORA OVERHAUL\" BY VURT AND \"LUSH TREES\" BY OPTICSHOOTER !!!

This mod is an add-on for \"Skyrim Flora Overhaul\" by Vurt.With different trunks, may be more in the style of the original game.This is a great idea(to have different trunk and trees in the game), but I was not convinced by the trunks of this mod.So I propose this version;)

link (\"SKyrimFlora Overhaul\") :
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=141 # content
check out.

=======================================================================================

VERY IMPORTANT:
You need the folder \"meshes\" and two textures (Vurt_Pine01,Vurt_Pine02) included in this pack (or alone in the optional file).This is the sames which is located in \"Vurts_Skyrim_flora-Overhaul\". Without, no variation (that\'s all).

The main file contains all you need !


*The optional link (file) is just for credit and isolate Vurt\'s files (no confusion).

*If you are already using this mod (\"Skyrim Flora Overhaul\" by Vurt), You only need textures (The list in my description).You have just to extract them to \"data\" or copy all textures (of the list,).

*If you are using \"Lush trees\":

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3385
check out !

There is a compatible version.\"Opticshooter\" with \"Lush trees\" provides a link in these optional files
\"Lush Trees - Vurt compatibility patch\" for variations and combine these two MOD together.
Thanks to him  !
I\'m not really a fan because maybe, there are too many branches that hides the trunk.
But anyway, if you want to keep this mod, you need this patch.

VERY IMPORTANT: 
*Only textures of the list (personnal changes).It works with any \"mod\"(just no variation for these trees \"treepineforestbarkcomp\").

*Finally, If you don\'t like this texture: \"Vurt_Pine01\" and \"Vurt_Pine02\" by Vurt, I have added the vanilla version of this texture (\"treepineforestbranch\") with the same variation of color (colorimetry).Download the main file and just replace those two textures.
Check the optional files ;)
nb: \"Vurt_Pine01_n\" and \"Vurt_Pine02_n\", it\'s just in case...
I think the \".nif\" of Vurt takes the original texture for normalmap of the game.


=======================================================================================

EDIT:

VERSION1.1: I added two textures in main folder (whose you need).
VERSION1.2:Just all you need and my textures, nothing more.
VERSION1.3: It will include very high resolution maps (4096x1024) and add one more texture for \"treeaspenbarkcomp\".
VERSION1.4: I have change \"treeaspenbarkcomp\" and add \"treepineforestcut01\" .
VERSION1.5: Add textures and fix issue with a texture.
VERSION1.6: Just fix one texture (\"treepineforestcut01\").

Enjoy ;)

LIST, TEXTURES (personnal changes):

treepineforestbarkcomp
treepineforestbarkcomp_n
treepineforestbarkcomp1
treepineforestbarkcomp1_n
treepineforestbarkcomp2
treepineforestbarkcomp2_n
treepineforestbarkcomp3
treepineforestbarkcomp3_n
treepineforestbarkcompsnow
treepineforestbarkcompsnow_n
treepineforestbarkcompsnowl
treepineforestbarkcompsnowl_n
treeaspenbarkcomp
treeaspenbarkcomp_n
treepineforestcut01
treepineforestcut01_n
choppingblock01
choppingblock01_n
choppingblock01bloody
choppingblock01bloody_n
firewood01
firewood01_n
treeaspenaddon01
treeaspenaddon01_n
treepineforestaddon01
treepineforestaddon01_n
treereachaddon01

(nb:Included mipmap and alphas for normalmap).


Installation:
Extract the archive into your Skyrim/Data directory.

Uninstall:
Delete the files of the list.

=======================================================================================

I recommend this MOD too:
